title: Sliver 4 adc/mid main looking for ranked team
body:
Hey my name is Dion but most people call me S I D  or Twist, I am a sliver 4 mid/adc main looking for a ranked team, I am looking to improve as a player and make new friends along the way, I have team speak, Skype and curse voice for communication, my main adc's are Draven , lucian, Quinn, ez, kalista and triSt bit I mainly play draven, lucian and trist in adc and my main mid laners are Jayce, Quinn, Annie and lb but I mainly play Quinn and Annie mid.

If you are interested in a mid/adc main for your ranked team add me up my ign is Twisted S I D
